channel.title: Dr Maria Witek on Dr Maria Witek
channel.description: Recent content in Dr Maria Witek on Dr Maria Witek

item.title: Upcoming interview on BBC Radio 3
item.description: On May 20th 5pm, I’ll be on BBC Radio 3’s Listening Service talking to Tom Service about why syncopated music makes people want to move. Tune in! If you miss the broadcast, you can also listen to it as a podcast shortly after.

item.title: Extended Mind, Vibe and Dance Music Consciousness
Now you hear it: a predictive coding model for understanding rhythmic incongruity
